about.title: CAPTAIN'S LOG: SCOTT HARVEY-WHITTLE
about.bio: My designation is Scott Harvey-Whittle, currently assigned to The Open University. My primary directive is the completion of a BSc (Honours) in Computing and IT.
about.inspiration: Inspired by the voyages of the U.S.S. Voyager, my personal mission is one of perpetual learning and exploration. I am committed to navigating the vast expanse of technology and bringing innovative projects from the conceptual stage into the public domain.
about.closing: The final frontier is knowledge, and my journey is to continuously push its boundaries.

projects.title: Starship Portfolio Interface
projects.desc: After extensive deep-space reconnaissance, Command issued a priority directive: establish a new communications hub. This project required navigating uncharted sectors of React and TypeScript, facing numerous temporal anomalies and subspace distortions. After a long voyage through the debugging nebula, the interface is now fully operational.

projects.title: Code Institute 5 Day Challenge
projects.desc: Mission Directive: A 5-day rapid deployment exercise to construct a functional web interface. HTML & CSS protocols calibrated, semantic tags implemented, secure links established.

projects.title: Cheat Sheets
projects.desc: Recognizing a tactical need for immediate access to critical information, I commissioned the Cheatsheet Databank. This central repo aids swift reference for Markdown, programming dialects and protocols.

projects.title: MathTool
projects.desc: During initial training, I engineered a tactical mathematics simulator. The program engages users with rapid-response calculations, logging accuracy and efficiency for mission records.

mission_update.update_title: ENROLMENT CONFIRMED: BSc (Honours) in Computing and IT
mission_update.update_desc: Intelligence from the 'IT Job Market' sector revealed a recurring prerequisite: certification in Computing and IT. Commissioned to a long-term mission with the Open University, commencing Stardate 2024.02.
Required navigation through a nebula of complex formulas; proved formidable.

mission_update.update_title: Directive: TM111 Intro to Technology, Part 1
mission_update.update_desc: Foundational schematics delivered; advanced protocols (Python) in Part 2 planned.
Initiated and successfully concluded; marked operational milestone.
Cleared for Level 2 study, advancing operational standards.
Level 2 operations underway, new directives: M250 (Java), TM257 (Cisco Networking, Part 1).
Next phase: advanced strategic training, Level 3 protocols, final clearance preparation.
Computing and IT Project. Completion signifies fulfillment of primary directive; graduation eligibility.
